clinical_history: Patient presents with cough and fever.
findings: Small pneumothorax on the left lower lobe side.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 39 mm in diameter.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in left lower lobe.
Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in left lower lobe.
Enlarged lymph nodes in left lower lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
recommendations: Clinical correlation advised; refer to pulmonologist.
